text: Ralph Donald Stewart (born December 2, 1948 in Fort William, Ontario) is a retired professional ice hockey player who played 251 games in the National Hockey League. He played with the Vancouver Canucks and New York Islanders. == Other websites == * Category:1948 births Category:Canadian ice hockey centres Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Living people Category:New York Islanders players Category:Vancouver Canucks players
title: Ralph Stewart
